name: Box Circle Thunder
description:
In this game you do not have control over the player, nor can you see the majority of the level. Instead, you move around the box that contains the player and also allows you to see behind the level "shroud".  Using the arrow keys or WASD, move the box around trying to find the enemies and slam the player into them to defeat them. Be careful! If you don't hit them fast enough they will hurt you instead!

Credit:

Programming: Imran Bharadia, Marquis McCann

Art: Tyriese Miller

Music: MoFi
